display_long_description:
🔥 What’s New in Version 1.2.0 – DanceFloorVR™ Update!
Step into the beat with our biggest update yet! 🎶
We’ve supercharged the experience with new music genres, themed arenas, and gameplay tweaks based on player feedback. Whether you're a casual dancer or a rhythm warrior — there's something fresh for you!
🎵 4 Music Genre Modes!
Choose your groove before each session:
✅Electro Pop (Neon City)
✅EDM / Cyber Rave
✅Hip-Hop / Street Arena
✅Synthwave / Retro Arcade
Each genre comes with unique music, wall visuals, and mood-based effects.
🕺 Combo  Introduced
Hit 3+ perfect moves in a row to trigger a glowing COMBO chain!🔥

⚡ Rhythm-Based Challenges:
✅ Players must step on highlighted grids in time with the music.
✅ Each successful hit increases the score, while missed steps reduce the momentum.

⭐ Responsive Controls:
✅ VR controller and head tracking ensure intuitive, natural movement.
✅ Visual feedback (e.g., grid “press” animations and material changes) confirms successful actions.

🎶Dynamic Audio & Visuals:
✅ An electrifying soundtrack that drives gameplay.
✅ High-quality visual effects and lighting that respond to player actions.

🌟User Interface:
✅ A clean, easy-to-navigate main menu featuring options like Start, How to Play, and About.
✅ In-game UI elements (such as a countdown timer and pause/resume controls) are designed for clarity and immersion.

🏅Game Modes & Replayability:
✅ A standard game mode with increasing difficulty.
✅ Leaderboards and scoring systems to encourage replay and mastery.
